channel.title: PI maby simple question!
channel.description:
Okay so i have problem when i die at duel arena it respawns me on the thzaar cave, anyway all the time i die it just respawns all ppl on that place. how i can fix it?
please help. i mean it does all that too random , because on duel arena it is like sometimes resapwning me at duel arena place but sometime at thzaar cave so idk how to fix it never happened with me lol. Help pelase i will rep++

item.title: PI maby simple question!
item.dc:creator: @David321 David321
item.description:
@David321 wrote:

[quote=“Derpington, post:2, topic:432877”]Are the coords set @ duel arena at config.java [server sided] ?

Like this:

public static final int DUELING_RESPAWN_X = 3362; // when dead in duel area spawn here
public static final int DUELING_RESPAWN_Y = 3263;

Idk what else the problem could be, sorry.[/quote]

yes they are , and basically i got this inside already
I dont know why it randomly respawns me on other place ,
How i fix it please help.

Read full topic

item.title: PI maby simple question!
item.dc:creator: @Derpington Derpington
item.description:
@Derpington wrote:

Are the coords set @ duel arena at config.java [server sided] ?

Like this:

public static final int DUELING_RESPAWN_X = 3362; // when dead in duel area spawn here
public static final int DUELING_RESPAWN_Y = 3263;

Idk what else the problem could be, sorry.
